item.description: A series of analog-processed logos for my music project. First version of the logo Second version of the logo Third version of the logo Detail of the texture of the logo

item.title: Black Metal December 2022
item.description: Black metal logos and symbols a day during the month of December. Arcane Chaux Vive Grim Cairn Sigil Eternal Flame Lucifer Sigil ACAB Trolls & Goblins Katabasis Abysmal Elder Sign No AI Solstice

item.title: The Hookups
item.description: Death metal style logo for the psych surf rock band The Hookups. The Hookups death metal logo

item.title: Custom lettering work
item.description: Band / Project logo I have quite a bit of experience doing lettering work and logos for bands of a good range of genres but mostly black metal, doom, dungeon synth, noise and experimental music. When you commission me a logo, the first step is talking a bit more with you about what you’re envisioning and getting any inspirations that you like as a reference point (you can also just give me wildcard and I’ll work from the music and the name itself).

item.title: VOIDXWITCH
item.description: I made this logo for VOIDXWITCH based on a scribbled text they made. The concept was to play around with some angry but childlike drawing style and the void tearing at it. Scribbled logo in white on black Voidxwitch logo in use in their first music video

item.title: Cuisinons avec amour
item.description: Lettering for a t-shirt design for a group of cooks. Cuisinons avec amour lettering with a small heart-shaped vegetable on top

item.title: Sworn to Darkness
item.description: Woodcut style occult inspired logo for Sworn to Darkness Sworn to darkness logo and symbol In order to get a realistic woodcut style I made a linocut of the symbol first to guide the drawing of the letters, here are some photos of this process: carved linocut symbol inking and printing the linocut the printed symbol and the linocut final printed symbol

item.title: Henbane
item.description: A lettering piece made inspired by the henbane herb, used by european witches in their flying ointment. Henbane lettering

item.title: Black Metal December 2021
item.description: As I did in 2017 , I’m making a black metal inspired typography piece every day of the month of December. Grief Systemic racism Wassail Cold Chagrin Fanghorn Dungeon Nameless dread Summoning Occult Hive Krampus Den of evil Stone Circle The Return of the Repressed Goth Resentment Veil Ruined Tower Nazgul Bog Body Chthonien

item.title: Vacarme Hurlant
item.description: Logo for a blackened death metal band from Quebec. Vacarme Hurlant logo in white on black Vacarme Hurlant logo in black on white

item.title: Foulest Witch
item.description: Hand-drawn logo, sigil and illustrations for Foulest Witch, a black metal, dark ambient and ritual music label. Complete logo with sigil and lettering Sigil Sigil with text Dagger and candleholder

item.title: Nicole Marxen
item.description: Hand-drawn band logo for the solo project of Nicole Marxen , a mix of avant-garde pop, synthwave and experimental rock. Her first album is a meditation on grief and the painful and messy process of going through these feelings, in her own words: “I often compare the experience to uncovering a crystal, digging through foundation to discover something both jagged and brilliantly beautiful.” Logo on a project photo Logo in grey on black

item.title: Nihtgengan
item.description: Hand-drawn band logo for the oniric dungeon synth / darkambient project Nihtgengan Nihtgengan logo in white on black Nihtgengan logo in black on white

item.title: Ariel Doom
item.description: A lettering piece made for the black metal-themed art project of a friend, see more over on her instagram . Ariel Doom logo in white on black Ariel Doom logo in black on white

item.title: T for Trans
item.description: A personal project made for on instagram alphabet of LGBTQIA terms. T for Trans in black letter style

item.title: Golem Heart dice
item.description: Logo for a friend’s custom gaming dice project. The lettering is based on an existing font with heavy modifications and texturing. The heart was sculpted in clay, photographed and edited. If you’re interesting in custom gaming dice look up his work here: https://www.instagram.com/golemheartdice/

item.title: Stay à la maison
item.description: Small lettering piece made during a rough patch in the pandemic, remembering people to stay home. Lettering reading stay à la maison
